TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DictationGrammar extends System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar

summary.span: 表示用于自由文本口述的语音识别语法。

span.span: Represents a speech recognition grammar used for free text dictation.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例用于 Windows 桌面语音技术提供的默认命令语法。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the default dictation grammar provided by Windows Desktop Speech Technology.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的听写语法来模拟标准听写实践，包括标点。The default dictation grammar emulates standard dictation practices, including punctuation. 它不支持某个单词的拼写。It does not support the spelling of a word.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string topic) cil managed

param.name: topic
param.span: 一个符合 XML 的统一资源标识符 (URI)，指定听写语法（grammar:dictation 或 grammar:dictation#spelling）。

span.span: An XML-compliant Universal Resource Identifier (URI) that specifies the dictation grammar, either grammar:dictation or grammar:dictation#spelling.

summary.span: 用特定的口述语法初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specific dictation grammar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音平台使用专用的 URI 语法来定义自定义的听写语法。The Speech platform uses a specialized URI syntax to define the custom dictation grammar. 值`grammar:dictation`指示默认的听写语法。The value `grammar:dictation` indicates the default dictation grammar. 值`grammar:dictation#spelling`指示拼写听写语法。The value `grammar:dictation#spelling` indicates the spelling dictation grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDictationContext (string precedingText, string subsequentText);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetDictationContext(string precedingText, string subsequentText) cil managed
Public Sub SetDictationContext (precedingText As String, subsequentText As String)
public: void SetDictationContext(System::String ^ precedingText, System::String ^ subsequentText);

param.name: precedingText
param.span: 文本指示口述上下文的开端。

span.span: Text that indicates the start of a dictation context.

param.name: subsequentText
param.span: 文本指示口述上下文的末尾。

span.span: Text that indicates the end of a dictation context.

summary.span: 添加上下文到由 或 对象加载的听写语法。

span.span: Adds a context to a dictation grammar that has been loaded by a or a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，听写语法不会使用特定的词或 word 顺序来标识和解释音频输入。By default, the dictation grammar does not make use of specific words or word order to identify and interpret audio input. 识别引擎上下文添加到听写语法，使用`precedingText`和`subsequentText`来确定何时将解释为听写的语音。When a context is added to a dictation grammar, the recognition engine uses the `precedingText` and `subsequentText` to identify when to interpret speech as dictation. > [!NOTE] > 必须由加载的听写语法或对象，然后可以使用若要添加的上下文。A dictation grammar must be loaded by a or object before you can use to add a context. 下表描述识别引擎如何使用两个参数来确定何时使用听写语法。The following table describes how the recognition engine uses the two parameters to determine when to use the dictation grammar. |`precedingText`|`subsequentText`|描述Description| |---------------------|----------------------|-----------------| |非 `null`not `null`|非 `null`not `null`|识别引擎使用的术语来进行分类可能候选短语。The recognition engine uses the terms to bracket possible candidate phrases.| |`null`|非 `null`not `null`|识别引擎使用`subsequentText`完成听写。The recognition engine uses the `subsequentText` to finish dictation.| |非 `null`not `null`|`null`|识别引擎使用`precedingText`启动听写。The recognition engine uses the `precedingText` to start dictation.| |`null`|`null`|识别引擎不使用上下文时使用听写语法。The recognition engine does not use a context when using the dictation grammar.|
